snippet: At age 19, Jurickson Profar became the youngest major leaguer to hit a home run since his teammate Adrian Beltre did it in 1998.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers defeat Cleveland Indians, 8-3; Rangers rookie shortstop Jurickson Profar has a memorable debut, becoming the youngest major leaguer to hit a home run since 1998; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: At age 19, Jurickson Profar became the youngest major leaguer to hit a home run since his teammate Adrian Beltre did it in 1998.

headline.seo: Profar Homers in First At-Bat as Rangers Win
headline.main: In First At-Bat in Majors, a Homer to Help Lift Texas
headline.print_headline: In First At-Bat in Majors, A Homer to Help Lift Texas
